# Background
***

This rmarkdown is meant to test the svglite R package with Mac's Affinity Designer.

```{r setup}
library("knitr")
library("svglite")
library("ggplot2")
library("magrittr")

knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  dev = "svglite",
  fig.path = "figures/"
)
```

# ggplot2
***

Here we generate a simple ggplot2 scatterplot of the mtcars dataset.

```{r svglite_test}
mtcars %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = wt, y = mpg)) +
  geom_point()
```
